short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your start page into a powerful, customizable platform for your most important links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Better StartPage - Bookmarks for Work is the ultimate start page for productive work environments. This browser extension replaces your default start page with a customized, clean, and powerful interface where you can organize your links and bookmarks into Workspaces, Groups, and Collections.

Whether you need to manage frequently visited websites, important project resources, or research materials, Better StartPage allows you to store all your essential links in well-structured categories and access them with a single click. Customize your start page to fit your needs, enhancing your productivity and making it easier to access what matters most.

Features:
  Organize: Create Workspaces, Groups, and Collections to categorize your links and bookmarks.
  One-Click Access: Open your saved links with a single click directly from your start page.
  Customizable Interface: Set up your start page the way that works best for you.

With Better StartPage - Bookmarks for Work, your start page becomes the central hub for everything you need on the web.
